text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in Brachytherapy Permanent Seeds Technique Value Set
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Brachytherapy Low Dose Rate Temporary Radation Technique Value Set
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Brachytherapy Pulsed Dose Rate Technique Value Set
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Brachytherapy High Dose Rate Technique Value Set
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Brachytherapy High Dose Rate Electronic Technique Value Set
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Brachytherapy Radiopharmaceutical Technique Value Set

name: BrachytherapyTechniqueVS
title: Brachytherapy Technique Value Set
description: Codes describing the techniques of brachytherapy (internal or surface radiation) procedures.
